summary: This document contains resolutions from a Limited Liability Company (LLC) authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to act as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for the company. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers of the LLC regarding account management and the bank's reliance on their instructions.
keyFacts: The document is a Certificate of Limited Liability Company Resolutions in favor of Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It authorizes the bank to manage accounts for the LLC and outlines the powers of the authorized signers.
The document states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
There are provisions for the delegation of powers by the authorized signers to other agents.
The resolutions confirm that no one other than the LLC has any interest in the accounts opened in its name.
